nodes.text: The Menace of the Opera was a musical playing at the Galaxies Opera House in 19 BBY. A sign advertising the show was displayed outside of the opera house during a performance of Squid Lake attended by Palpatine and Anakin Skywalker. The sign depicted an imperial Stormtrooper helmet.
The play's title may have a dual reference to both Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace and the real-world operatic musical The Phantom of the Opera.
